description.en:
WYND is co-founded by Ethan Frey, the creator of CosmWasm, the smart contract platform used by most of the chains in the Cosmos Ecosystem, such as Osmosis, Juno, Stargaze, Secret, Luna Terra. WYND plans to launch numerous defi products in its ecosystem with a new DEX as its first product in early January.

WYND can be staked to earn rewards and to gain voting power to WYND DAO governance. These voting rights can be used to influence the future of WYND DAO. Additionally WYND voting power can be used to direct gauge weights for liquidity pool incentives on WYND DEX (similar to Curve gauges)
